header.topics: Films/theatre: live performances in local cinema; visiting friends, discussing acquaintances; local town cinema; deaths of friends/acquaintances; 'awkward' friend; shaking hands/kissing; relationships
header.activity: Friends talking about the local cinema, death, relationships and shaking hands/kissing.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, advising, anecdote telling
